title: Lal Isua hi thian tha ber a ni
lyrics:
Lal Isua hi thian tha ber a ni,
Khawvel buainain a nan chein;
Thinlung buainain a nan chein;
Thinlung hliam a tidam ang,
Thatna, chakna a pe ang;
Aw, Isua- thian tha ber a ni e.

Isua thian tha ber a ni e, (2)
I tluk chuan a tanpui ang,
I koh chuan a chhang ang che,
Aw, Isua- thian tha ber a ni e.

Thian tha ber Lal Isua ka nei a,
Thlarau tan remna, muanna a ni;
A kut chakin min pawm a,
Eng mah reng ka hlau lo vang;
Aw, Isua thian tha ber a ni e.

Zan lungngaihnaah kal mah ila,
Jordan lui khauh fawn dai mah ila,
Engmah reng ka hlau lo vang,
Chhandamtu'n min hruai vangin,
Aw, Isuua - thian tha ber a ni e.

Nakinah van chu kan thlen hunin,
Hmangaihte kan hmaa kal tawh nen;
Luipui mawi tak kamah chuan,
Amah kan fak reng tawh ang;
Aw, Isua- thian tha ber a ni e.
